completion_promises.criterion_text: QualityGateProfile in guardkit/models/task_types.py gets seam_tests_recommended: bool field
completion_promises.evidence: Added seam_tests_recommended: bool = False field to QualityGateProfile dataclass (line 120) with docstring explaining its purpose (lines 85-89)

completion_promises.criterion_text: FEATURE and REFACTOR profiles set seam_tests_recommended=True
completion_promises.evidence: DEFAULT_PROFILES for TaskType.FEATURE (line 200) and TaskType.REFACTOR (line 243) include seam_tests_recommended=True

completion_promises.criterion_text: SCAFFOLDING, DOCUMENTATION, TESTING profiles set seam_tests_recommended=False
completion_promises.evidence: These profiles use the default value seam_tests_recommended=False; verified by tests TestSeamTestRecommendation in test_task_types.py

completion_promises.criterion_text: Coach validation prompt (in coach_validator.py) includes seam test check when seam_tests_recommended=True
completion_promises.evidence: Added _check_seam_test_recommendation method in coach_validator.py that detects seam/contract/boundary/integration test patterns and adds 'consider' severity issue when profile.seam_tests_recommended is True

completion_promises.criterion_text: Feature plan template (in feature-plan.md) includes seam test checklist item
completion_promises.evidence: Added 'Seam Test Checklist' section with boundary type table and recommendations to installer/core/commands/feature-plan.md

completion_promises.criterion_text: Architecture docs updated: docs/architecture/quality-gate-pipeline.md reflects new gate
completion_promises.evidence: Added 'Seam Tests Recommended' column to Task Types table and new 'Seam Test Recommendation Gate' section to docs/architecture/quality-gate-pipeline.md
Added XC-seam-testing section documenting the soft gate approach, affected components, and constraints to docs/architecture/crosscutting-concerns.md

Ran pytest on tests/unit/test_task_types.py and tests/unit/test_coach_validator.py - all 276 tests pass. The commit c1b4ec51 was marked 'tests: pass' by guardkit-checkpoint. Pre-existing failures in test_task_769d_*.py (189 failures) are infrastructure issues from commits 60a5dffc and 2c48cd94 unrelated to this task.
